mcq.statement: Which statement is true about the physical state and sources of fats and oils?

options.a: Oils are solid and from animals; fats are liquid and from plants
options.b: Oils are liquid and from plants; fats are solid and from animals
options.c: Both are liquid and from plants
options.d: Both are solid and from animals

mcq.one_liner: **Oils are in liquid form and obtained from plants, while fats are solid and obtained from animals.**
